description: This dataset contains education variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2018 to 2022. It includes data related to educational attainment, such as high school graduation rates and higher education achievements, providing insights into education levels at the Census tract level.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: bachelors_degree_or_higher
variables.description: Percentage of the population 25 years and over with a Bachelor's degree or higher

variables.name: high_school_or_higher
variables.description: Percentage of the population 25 years and over who are high school graduates or higher

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
